name: Matchmaker in Heaven
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2019 and theme was: ONLY ONE

You are the Goddess of Love™ and it's your task to play heavenly matchmaker and put soulmates together. Rummage through heaps of potential suitors until you find the THE ONE AND ONLY ONE TRUE SOULMATE™ for your client and then just, as we in the business call it, swipe them right. You have only one swipe to the right and if you choose wrong then... well let's say that millions will suffer. 

Come and try Matchmaker in Heaven. It's like Papers, please... of love. 

Made by:
Coding master and all around cool guy
